greed.description: This sin makes money an idol that replaces trust in God's providence, turning what should be a tool for good into an object of worship.

greed.question: Did I make accumulating wealth a driving force in my life?
greed.description: This sin makes money an idol that replaces trust in God's providence, turning what should be a tool for good into an object of worship.

greed.question: Did I make accumulating wealth and possessions a driving force in my life, turning what should be a tool for good into an object of worship?
greed.description: This sin makes money an idol that replaces trust in God's providence, turning what should be a tool for good into an object of worship.

oppression.question: Have I mistreated, harassed, or discriminated against others through my actions or deeds?
oppression.description: It's a sin to execute an unjust and cruel exercise of power or authority over others instead of respecting the God-given dignity of every human person.

extracted_data_phrases: by exercising unjust and cruel power over them
oppression.question: Have I, in my actions towards others, mistreated, harassed, or discriminated against them by exercising unjust and cruel power over them?
oppression.description: It's a sin to execute an unjust and cruel exercise of power or authority over others instead of respecting the God-given dignity of every human person.

extracted_data_phrases: to my own hard work and determination
autonomy.question: Did I mistakenly attribute my success, achievements, and good fortune to my own hard work and determination, forgetting to acknowledge God's providence in guiding me?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

autonomy.question: Did I take for granted my own accomplishments, forgetting to acknowledge God's providence in my successes?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

autonomy.question: Did I attribute my successes in career and finance to my own self-reliance, forgetting to acknowledge God's providence and guidance?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

extracted_data_phrases: in speaking to others with vulgar or inappropriate language
incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control in speaking to others with vulgar or inappropriate language?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and speak to others using words that were vulgar or inappropriate?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in a manner that was hurtful , insulting , or unbecoming
incontinence.question: Did you lack self-control and speak to others in a manner that was hurtful, insulting, or unbecoming?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
to excess and waste of resources
gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, leading to excess and waste of resources?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, especially when dining out or attending social gatherings?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
to excesses that can harm my physical health and spiritual well - being
gluttony.question: Have I overindulged in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, leading to excesses that can harm my physical health and spiritual well-being?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in discussing my colleagues ' mistakes or personal struggles
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing my colleagues' mistakes or personal struggles, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in discussing others ' private affairs for personal amusement
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing others' private affairs for personal amusement, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in discussing my acquaintances ' faults or personal matters
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing my acquaintances' faults or personal matters, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

impiety.question: Did I engage in activities on Sunday, a day reserved for rest and worship, when it was not absolutely necessary?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).

impurity.question: Did you intentionally use certain practices, substances, or objects to prevent pregnancy?
impurity.description: This sin intentionally separates the unitive and procreative purposes of marriage and violates the proper use of one's sexuality.

extracted_data_phrases: than those intended for medical purposes
impurity.question: Did I use substances or objects, other than those intended for medical purposes, to prevent pregnancy in any way?
impurity.description: This sin intentionally separates the unitive and procreative purposes of marriage and violates the proper use of one's sexuality.
